Sentencas: Solid electrolytes are the most important and indispensable part of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) where hydrogen is used as one of the fuels to obtain electricity.
Titulo: Improved electrical conductivity of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 by co-doping

Sentencas: Ce0.9Gd0.3O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 were chosen to be the base electrolytes.
Titulo: Improved electrical conductivity of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 by co-doping

Sentencas: The effects of MgO and Nd2O3 as co-dopants on the electrical conductivity were investigated, respectively.
Titulo: Improved electrical conductivity of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 by co-doping

Sentencas: For 4 mol% Mgdoped Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 or Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95, MgO phases were detected by FESEM micrographs, which showed a very low solubility of Mg2+ in ceria lattice.
Titulo: Improved electrical conductivity of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 by co-doping

Sentencas: The existence of MgO phases was observed to have negligible effect on the grain conductivity, but improve the grain boundary conductivity measured by ac impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Improved electrical conductivity of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 by co-doping

Sentencas: However, when Nd2O3 was used as a co-dopant, XRD patterns and FESEM both indicated a pure cubic phase.
Titulo: Improved electrical conductivity of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 by co-doping

Sentencas: Ce0.9Gd0.05Nd0.05O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.05Nd0.05O1.95 were found to exhibit higher grain conductivity, comparing with single-doped ceria.
Titulo: Improved electrical conductivity of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and Ce0.9Sm0.1O1.95 by co-doping
